creator: khammond25@home.com
text:
In version 1.6.1, the user interface allows a user to remove (by right-clicking 
and selecting Remove) the WorkBench and TestPlan elements with no way to put 
them back in.

Also, if you attempt to remove the Root element, a Java exception is thrown.

The context menu should gray-out the "Remove" menu item for Root, TestPlan, and 
WorkBench elements.

Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com

text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
